name: Tribute to Linkin Park Ft Anthracite
about: Join us for a tribute to Linkin Park featuring Anthracite on their Hard Rock Cafe India Tour. Anthracite brings a unique blend of Rap Rock/Nu Metal to the stage, appealing to a diverse audience beyond just metalheads. Get ready for an electrifying night filled with high energy and great music at the Hard Rock Cafe!

location.name: Hard Rock Cafe Bengaluru Whitefield
location.address: Unit G-25 & 26, Ground Floor, Park Square Mall International Tech Park, Bangalore, Pattandur Agrahara

name: Martin Roth at Sunburn Union
about: Get ready for an unforgettable night with Martin Roth at Sunburn Union on 7th July. Renowned for his classic progressive house sounds blended with avant-garde deep house, Martin Roth's exceptional talent has earned him a top spot in the global underground dance music scene. Don't miss out on this electrifying event!

location.name: Sunburn Union
location.address: Passport office, Mantri Avenue, KHB Games Village, Koramangala

name: Aname (Anjunabeats) Live at Gylt Bangalore
about: Experience an electrifying night at Redroom_Blr featuring Anjunabeats, Rohan Kapoor, Nick Lima b2b Sidbit, and more on Saturday, 29th June 2024, from 4 PM onwards at Gylt Bangalore. Enjoy melodic techno and progressive house music brought to you by Redroom_Blr X Pumproom, NK Production, M6Music, and Gylt Bangalore.

name: Social Sunday Sundowner X Flypship & Ards || #Koramangalasocial  | Iehpl
about: Experience the return of Flypship x Ards India at Koramangala Social on June 30th! Enjoy DJ sets by Reflectedray, Carissa, Marc Morais, AR, Amir, and Ash, along with a special act featuring Doc. Awes on bass guitar and MPC, and X Jason on drums. Dance to a mix of house, disco, funk, and hip hop music all night long. Don't miss this electrifying night filled with incredible vibes and high energy!

location.name: Koramangala Social
location.address: 118, 3rd Floor, Koramangala Industrial Area, 7th Block, Above Bodyworks Spa, 7th Block, Koramangala

This exclusive performance in India promises to be a musical journey transcending genres, featuring PCRC's unique sound and talented lineup.

Don't miss this monumental occasion - be part of history and dance the night away at India's largest club.

name: Redroom Ft. Deepme at Gylt Bangalore

name: Sunburn Arena Ft. Alan Walker - Bengaluru
about: Join the electrifying journey with Alan Walker's tour hitting major cities across India. Experience the magic of his hits like "Faded" and "Alone" turning into unforgettable memories. Let the pulsating beats of "Spectre" and "Darkside" ignite your passion for music. Secure your tickets now for a night of pure energy and epic music!

name: Stan Kolev at Sunburn Union
about: Experience the electrifying beats of Stan Kolev at Sunburn Union in Bangalore on July 6th, 2024. Immerse yourself in his melodic soundscapes and rhythmic tunes that promise an unforgettable night of electronic and progressive house music. Get your tickets now for a magical connection between artist and audience under state-of-the-art lights and sounds.
